Description: The Temptation of St Antony; vaulted interior seen beyond an arch in the foreground, Antony seated near a cross to left, a semi-nude woman approaching at r, surrounded by demons and winged creatures Brush drawing in grey ink and brown wash
Bibliographic references: Hind 1915-31 / Catalogue of Dutch and Flemish Drawings preserved in the Department of Prints and Drawings in the British Museum (12)
Associated names: Representation of: St Antony of Egypt
Acquisition name: Purchased from: W H Barnard (the late)
